title: Having an issue with charged abilities casting immediately
body:
I've experienced this with several champions and both on the PBE and the live server.

Basically, most abilities that require a charge up time to increase the range will often cast immediately, leading to some extremely frustrating results (like having your Poppy ult automatically whiff in the middle of a teamfight).

I haven't seen many people having this issue so I'm thinking that this is an isolated incident, but as of now, I have no idea how to resolve it.

Any help is appreciated!

replies.body: I'm not aware of any issues that could be causing charging abilities to cast right away.  Charged abilities may be handled differently depending the champion and if you have smart cast enabled.  What happens if you hold down the ability key for a few seconds?  If you continue to have this problem, I suggest posting it over at our[ Report A Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) section for our QA to look at.  Hope that helps!

What happens if you hold down the ability key for a few seconds?  If you continue to have this problem, I suggest posting it over at our[ Report A Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) section for our QA to look at.  Hope that helps!

I usually hold down the ability because not doing so causes it to be cast immediately.

I do have smartcast enabled and the issue persists even when holding down the ability key for a sufficient amount of time. 

The only thing that works for me (and it only works temporarily) is unbinding and rebinding the key. This lets me charge the ability as normal for the first few attempts before reverting back to casting instantly.
